Ultra Quiet Generator Ranges
John F Hunt Power carry two ranges of Ultra Quiet Generators to give our customers the
widest possible choice. Both ranges offer up to 20dBA @ 7m less than our Silenced generators.

Flybrid Generators
With rising fuel costs and increased focus on all industries to reduce their carbon footprint, we’ve recently LQWURGXFHG )/<%5,' XQLWV WR RXU ÁHHW RI WHPSRUDU\ SRZHU HTXLSPHQW
This latest offering will allow our clients to simultaneously reduce their fuel usage, whilst lowering the environmental impact of their power supply.
%\ XVLQJ RXU )O\EULG XQLWV LQ FRQMXQFWLRQ ZLWK RXU GLHVHO JHQHUDWRUV ZH·UH DEOH WR RIIHU D QHZ VROXWLRQ which allows for considerable generator downsizing in many applications.
+LVWRULFDOO\ JHQHUDWRUV KDYH EHHQ VL]HG WR VXLW WKH SHDN VWDUW XS ORDG GHPDQG ZKHQ XVHG LQ DSSOLFDWLRQV such as:
• Tower Cranes • Pumps • Hoists • Medical Scanners etc
With loads of this nature, ZKLFK KDYH D VXEVWDQWLDO GHPDQG IRU SRZHU RQ VWDUW XS, generators are often left to run at low load factors, for long periods of time, resulting in poor fuel economy and engine performance.
1RZ E\ XVLQJ RXU )O\EULG XQLWV JHQHUDWRUV FDQ EH GRZQVL]HG to provide more economical running after start-up, reduced fuel usage and much improved carbon credentials.

How does it work?
)O\EULG XQLWV FRQWDLQ FXWWLQJ HGJH Á\ZKHHO HQHUJ\ VWRUDJH WHFKQRORJ\ DQG GHOLYHU DQ XOWUD IDVW SRZHU injection for smooth and controlled generator loading.
2Q VWDUW XS ZKHQ WKH UHTXLUHPHQW IRU ORDG LV VLJQLÀFDQWO\ KLJKHU ERWK JHQHUDWRU DQG )O\EULG XQLW ZRUN LQ FRQMXQFWLRQ WR SURYLGH WKH UHTXLUHG SRZHU
Once the demand drops off, the generator runs as a standalone unit and the Flybrid regenerates in SUHSDUDWLRQ IRU WKH QH[W SHDN UHTXLUHPHQW

What are the results?
:H KDYH FDUULHG RXW VLJQLÀFDQW WHVWLQJ DFURVV D QXPEHU RI PDMRU SURMHFWV DVVHVVLQJ WKH SURGXFW RQ OLYH applications across different sectors.
Amongst our testing, we applied a Flybrid unit to a tower crane set up for a major construction client in the Midlands.

Our powerful battery powered units provide the latest energy storage technology to help reduce the carbon footprint of your project. When used in conjunction with our diesel generators, these units drasti- cally reduce fuel usage, helping you achieve your sustainability goals.
When noise is an issue, these units provide the solution. Commonly used overnight or during periods of lower power demand, these units give an intelligent, dependable power system, enhancing the perfor- mance of any modern-day site. • Backup or stand-alone • RCD/MCB protection operation • Pure sine wave inverter • Remote generator start • LCD control panel • Lifting ring & forklift • Data logger pockets • Ceeform connections • One piece lift canopy • Battery isolator • Easy access service • Overload protection doors • Remote monitoring kit • Bus bar for hard wiring • OPzV battery technology
